name: Adventure Block 2: The End of Adventure
name_original: Adventure Block 2: The End of Adventure
description:
This Game Is My Making

This Game Tells About The End Of The Adventure This Block

Block can jump and can move

You Have To Control The Character By Using The Joystick

Note : This game does not have a jump button because the backfill of the jump button is normal, but when you press it suddenly the backfill changes to a large size

HAVE FUN!!!

Join My Discord
